description: distressed looking figure with hands outstretched in the upper right of image reaching for a figure on the left side who is lying down with closed eyes; figures drawn in thick black lines and colored with yellow, pink, and blue
inscription: LL in pencil, below platemark: Handdruck. | LL margin of sheet, in pencil: Dr. Rauert E.81 - Schwarzstein handkoloriert oder persönlich gefärbt A
signed: LR in pencil, below image and above platemark: Walter Gramatté / 20 | LL in pencil, below image and above platemark: Qual.
title: Torment
